action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) колющего урона.

action.name: Pincer Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Until this grapple ends, the kuo-toa can't use its pincer staff on another target.

immune.note: from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The kraken can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Freedom of Movement
entries: The kraken ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be {@condition restrained}. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being {@condition grappled}.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The kraken deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kraken makes three tentacle attacks, each of which it can replace with one use of Fling.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by the kraken, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the kraken, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the kraken's turns. If the kraken takes 25 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the kraken must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the kraken. If the kraken dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 10 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. The kraken has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

action.name: Fling
entries: One Large or smaller object held or creature {@condition grappled} by the kraken is thrown up to 40 feet in a random direction and knocked {@condition prone}. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Lightning Storm
entries: The kraken magically creates three bolts of lightning, each of which can strike a target the kraken can see within 120 feet of it. A target must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 11 ({@damage 2d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Tentacle Attack or Fling
entries: The kraken makes one tentacle attack or uses its Fling.

legendary.name: Lightning Storm (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The kraken uses Lightning

legendary.name: Ink Cloud (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: While underwater, the kraken expels an ink cloud in a 40-foot radius. The cloud spreads around corners, and that area is heavily obscured to creatures other than the kraken. Each creature other than the kraken that ends its turn there must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, taking 16 ({@damage 3d10}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A strong current disperses the cloud, which otherwise disappears at the end of the kraken's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Thekobold is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) колющего урона.

action.name: Sling
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Dragon Breath (1/Day)
entries: The kobold exhales poison in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of its turns, the kobold can use a bonus action to take the {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, or {@action Hide} action.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The kobold deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the kobold that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the kobold doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) колющего урона.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов или дальность 30/120 футов, одна цель. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) колющего урона.

trait.name: Lightfooted
entries: The kobold can take the {@action Dash} or {@action Disengage} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Skirmish Advantage
entries: The kobold gains advantage on its first attack roll this turn if it has moved at least 15 feet from its space at the beginning of its turn.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов или дальность 30/120 футов, одна цель. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) колющего урона.

reaction.name: Skirmisher
entries: When an enemy the kobold can see ends its turn within 5 feet of it, the kobold can move up to half its speed. This movement doesn't provoke {@action opportunity attack|phb|opportunity attacks}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The kobold is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following sorcerer spells prepared:

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Sorcery Points
entries: The kobold has 6 sorcery points. It can spend 1 or more sorcery points as a bonus action to gain one of the following benefits:

Empowered Spell: When the kobold rolls damage for a spell, it can spend 1 sorcery point to reroll up to 3 damage dice. It must use the new rolls. It can use Empowered Spell even if it has already used a different Metamagic option during the casting of the spell.
Quickened Spell: When the kobold casts a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, the giant can spend 2 sorcery points to change the casting time to 1 bonus action for this casting.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) колющего урона.

action.name: Sling
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Dragon Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The kobold exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Kenku Sneak
languages: understands Auran and Common but speaks only through the use of its Mimicry trait

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: The kenku has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of its turns, the kenku can take the {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The kenku has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The kenku deals an extra 3 ({@dice 1d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the kenku that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the kenku doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} попадание, досягаемость 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) колющего урона.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Mimicry

trait.name: Stunning Strike (3/Day)
entries: Once per turn, when the kenku hits a creature with a melee weapon attack, it can force the creature to make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the creature's next turn.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the kenku is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifer.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kenku makes three attacks, each of which can be an unarmed strike or a dart attack.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} попадание, досягаемость 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) урон от удара.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} попадание, дальность 20/60 футов, одна цель. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) колющего урона.

monster.name: Kenku Gang Boss
languages: understands Auran and Common but speaks only through the use of its Mimicry trait

trait.name: Cunning Action

trait.name: Ganglord's Presence
entries: A kenku ally that starts its turn with 30 feet of this kenku and can see and hear this kenku deals an extra 3 ({@dice 1d6}) damage on its weapon damage rolls against a creature if at least two of the kenku's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The kenku has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The kenku deals an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the kenku that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the kenku doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kenku makes two shortsword attacks or two shortbow attacks.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) колющего урона.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The jackalwere is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following bard spells prepared:

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The jackalwere can use its action to polymorph into a specifc Medium human or a jackal-humanoid hybrid, or back into its true form (that of a Small jackal). Other than its size, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The jackalwere has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The jackalwere has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warhound's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Dark Whispers
entries: The jackalwere can use a bonus action on its turn to target one creature within 30 feet of it. If the target can hear the jackalwere, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. While {@condition frightened} in this way, a creature must take the {@action Dash} action and move away from the jackalwere by the safest available route on each of its turns, unless there is nowhere to move, in which case it needn't take the Dash

action.name: line of sight to the jackalwere, the creature can repeat the saving
entries: throw. On a success, the effect ends.

action.name: Psychic Blades (3/day)
entries: The jackalwere deals an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack.

action.name: Bite ( Jackal or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) колющего урона.

action.name: Scimitar (Human or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Sleep Gaze
entries: The jackalwere gazes at one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 10} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target succumbs to a magical slumber, falling {@condition unconscious} for 10 minutes or until someone uses an action to shake the target awake. A creature that successfully saves against the effect is immune to this jackalwere's gaze for the next 24 hours.
Undead and creatures immune to being {@condition charmed} aren't affected by it.

reaction.name: Vexing Howl {@recharge 4}
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of the jackalwere, is visible to the jackalwere, and can hear the jackalwere makes an attack roll but before the outcome is determined, the jackalwere can impose disadvantage to the creature's attack roll. If the attack misses, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Charisma saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 3d8}) psychic damage and is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Sleep Gaze
entries: The jackalwere gazes at one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 10} Wisdom saving throw.

On a failed save, the target succumbs to a magical slumber, falling {@condition unconscious} for 10 minutes or until someone uses an action to shake the target awake. A creature that successfully saves against the effect is immune to this jackalwere's gaze for the next 24 hours.
Undead and creatures immune to being {@condition charmed} aren't affected by it.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The hydra can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: The hydra has five heads. While it has more than one head, the hydra has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.
Whenever the hydra takes 30 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, the hydra dies.

At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken cold damage since its last turn. The hydra regains 12 hit points for each head regrown in this way.

trait.name: Reactive Heads
entries: For each head the hydra has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for {@action opportunity attack|phb|opportunity attacks}.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the hydra sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hydra makes as many bite attacks as it has heads, each of which it can replace with one use of Fire Breath.

action.name: Bite

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hydra makes as many bite attacks as it has heads, and two tentacle attacks. It can replace both tentacle attacks with tentacle slam.

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw against disease or become {@condition poisoned} until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the target must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 5 ({@dice 1d10}) on a failure . The disease is cured on a success. The target dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until the disease is cured.

If the target is Large or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}) and {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends. The gulguthydra has two tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

entries: The gulguthydra slams creatures {@condition grappled} by it into each other or a solid surface. Each creature must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or take 20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the gulguthydra's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hobgoblin is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Martial Advantage (1/Turn)
entries: The hobgoblin can deal an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes two morningstar attacks.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} попадание, досягаемость 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) повреждений от удара.

reaction.name: Guided Strike (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The hobgoblin grants a + 10 bonus to an attack roll made by itself or another creature within 30 feet of it. The hobgoblin can make this choice after the roll is made but before it hits or misses.

trait.name: Martial Advantage (1/Turn)
entries: The hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes two longsword attacks or two longbow attacks.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) колющего урона или 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) колющего урона при использовании двумя руками.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} попадание, дальность 150/600 футов, одна цель. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) колющего урона.

reaction.name: Direct Counterstrike
entries: In response to a creature missing the hobgoblin with a melee attack and the attacker is visible to the hobgoblin, it can target an ally within 5 feet of the creature. If the ally can see and hear the hobgoblin, it uses its reaction to make one melee weapon attack against the creature with advantage on the attack roll.

headerEntries: The hobgoblin is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following sorcerer spells prepared:

trait.name: Arcane Advantage (1/Turn)
entries: The hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a damaging spell attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Martial Advantage (1/Turn)
entries: The hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Sorcery Points
entries: The hobgoblin has 6 sorcery points. It can spend 1 or more sorcery points as a bonus action to gain one of the following benefits:

Empowered Spell: When the hobgoblin rolls damage for a spell, it can spend 1 sorcery point to reroll up to 3 damage dice. It must use the new rolls. It can use Empowered Spell even if it has already used a different Metamagic option during the casting of the spell.
Quickened Spell: When the hobgoblin casts a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, the giant can spend 2 sorcery points to change the casting time to 1 bonus action for this casting.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes two spear attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Acid Breath (1/Day)
entries: The hobgoblin exhales acid in an 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Fire Breath (1/Day)
entries: The hobgoblin exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Lightfooted
entries: The hobgoblin can take the {@action Dash} or {@action Disengage} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Martial Advantage (1/Turn)
entries: The hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes two shortsword attacks or two longbow attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) колющего урона.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hobgoblin is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). It has the following paladin spells prepared:

trait.name: Aura of Dread
entries: A creature hostile to the hobgoblin that starts its turn within 20 feet of the hobgoblin must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw, unless the hobgoblin is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the target is {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn. While {@condition frightened} in this way, the target can't perform any actions except move up to half its speed. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the hobgoblin's Aura of Dread for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Martial Advantage (1/Turn)
entries: The hobgoblin can deal an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Smite (1/Turn)
entries: As a bonus action, when the hobgoblin hits a creature with a weapon attack, it can expend a 1st level spell slot to deal an extra {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn. The creature is {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition frightened}.
If the hobgoblin expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra necrotic damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each level above 1st (maximum 5d8).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes two morningstar attacks or two longbow attacks. It can use Command Ally in place of one weapon attack.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} попадание, дальность 150/600 футов, одна цель. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) колющего урона.

action.name: Command Ally
entries: The hobgoblin targets an ally within 30 feet that can see and hear the hobgoblin. The target uses its reaction to move up to half its speed and make one melee attack.

action.name: Dreadmaster's Presence (1/Day)
entries: Each ally within 30 feet of the hobgoblin, can see the hobgoblin, and not already affected by Dreadmaster's Presence gain advantage on attack rolls until the start of the hobgoblin's next turn. Each creature of the hobgoblin's choice that is within 30 feet of it, can see it, and not already affected by Dreadmaster's Presence become {@condition frightened} until the start of the hobgoblin's next turn.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) percing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) косой урон.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a Large or smaller creature it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be pushed 5 feet away and be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Rear Kick {@recharge 4}
entries: When a creature ends its turn within 5 feet of the hippogriff and is visible to the hippogriff, the hippogriff can attack it with its hooves.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) percing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) косой урон.

monster.name: Battle Horror

immune.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The battle horror has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The battle horror's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Spell Immunity
entries: The battle horror is immune to six spells chosen by its creator. Typical immunities include {@spell fireball}, {@spell heat metal}, and {@spell lightning bolt}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The battle horror makes three longsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The battle horror adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the battle horror must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

reaction.name: Spell Reflection
entries: If the battle horror makes a successful saving throw against a spell, or a spell attack misses it, the battle horror can choose another creature (including the spellcaster) it can see within 30 feet of it. The spell targets the chosen creature instead of the battle horror. If the spell forced a saving throw, the chosen creature makes its own save. If the spell was an attack, the attack roll is rerolled against the chosen creature.

monster.name: Nessian Warhound
languages: understands Infernal but can't speak it

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The warhound has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The warhound has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warhound's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the warhound moves at least 30 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a bite attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The warhound exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The harpy's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). The harpy can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The harpy is an 17th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:

trait.name: Agonizing Blast
entries: When the harpy casts eldritch blast, she adds her Charisma modifer to the damage it deals on a hit.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The harpy makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its mace.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Luring Song
entries: The harpy sings a magical melody. Every humanoid and giant within 300 feet of the harpy that can hear the song must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the song ends. The harpy must take a bonus action on its subsequent turns to continue singing. It can stop singing at any time. The song ends if the harpy is {@condition incapacitated}.

While {@condition charmed} by the harpy, a target is {@condition incapacitated} and ignores the songs of other harpies. If the {@condition charmed} target is more than 5 feet away from the harpy, the target can take the {@action Dash} action on its turn to move toward the harpy by the most direct route. It doesn't avoid {@action opportunity attack|phb|opportunity attacks}, but before moving into damaging terrain, such as lava or a pit , and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the harpy, a target can repeat the saving throw. A creature can also repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns . If a creature's saving throw is successful , the effect ends on it. A target that successfully saves is immune to this harpy's song for the next 24 hours.

reaction.name: Vexing Screech {@recharge 4}
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of the harpy, is visible to the harpy, and can hear the harpy makes an attack roll but before the outcome is determined, the harpy can impose disadvantage to the creature's attack roll. If the attack misses, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw or take 26 ({@damage 6d8}) psychic damage and is knocked {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The harpy's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). The harpy can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The harpy is an 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:

action.name: Mace

Every humanoid and giant within 300 feet of the harpy that can hear the song must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the song ends. If the {@condition charmed} target is more than 5 feet away from the harpy, the target can take the {@action Dash} action on its turn to move toward the harpy by the most direct route. It doesn't avoid {@action opportunity attack|phb|opportunity attacks}, but before moving into damaging terrain, such as lava or a pit , and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the harpy, a target can repeat the saving throw. A creature can also repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns . If a creature's saving throw is successful , the effect ends on it. A target that successfully saves is immune to this harpy's song for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The half-red dragon tyrannosaurus rex makes two attacks: one with its bite one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}33 ({@damage 4d12 + 7}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}) . Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the half-red dragon tyrannosaurus rex can't bite another target or use its fire breath.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} попадание, радиус действия 10 футов, одна цель. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) урон от удара.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-red dragon tyrannosaurus rex exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 56 ({@damage 16d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries: If the half-dragon moves at least 30 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the half-dragon can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the half-dragon moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing Damage.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) колющего урона.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon exhales acid in a 15- foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 5d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hag is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following sorcerer spells prepared:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The hag can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Horrifc Appearance
entries: Any humanoid that starts its turn within 30 feet of the hag and can see the hag's true form must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the hag is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the hag's Horrifc Appearance for the next 24 hours.

Unless the target is surprised or the revelation of the hag's true form is sudden, the target can avert its eyes and avoid making the initial saving throw. Until the start of its next turn, a creature that averts its eyes has disadvantage on attack rolls against the hag.

trait.name: Sorcery Points
entries: The hag has 12 sorcery points. It can spend 1 or more sorcery points as a bonus action to gain one of the following benefits:

Heightened Spell: When the hag casts a spell that forces a creature to make a saving throw to resist the spell's effects, the hag can spend 3 sorcery points to give one target of the spell disadvantage on its first saving throw against the spell.
Quickened Spell: When the hag casts a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, the hag can spend 2 sorcery points to change the casting time to 1 bonus action for this casting.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 24 hours.

action.name: Death Glare
entries: The hag targets one {@condition frightened} creature she can see within 30 feet of her. If the target can see the hag, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw against this magic or drop to 0 hit points.

action.name: Illusory Appearance
entries: The hag covers herself and anything she is wearing or carrying with a magical illu sion that makes her look like an ugly creature of her general size and humanoid shape. The effect ends if the hag takes a bonus action to end it or if she dies.

The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, the hag could appear to have no claws, but someone touching her hand might feel the claws. Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a {@dc 21} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check to discern that the hag is disguised.

reaction.name: Confounding Cackle {@recharge 4}
entries: When a creature targets the hag or the hag's ally with an attack, and the creature is within 30 feet, visible to and can hear the hag, the hag can force the creature to make a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the hag chooses another creature within reach or range of the attacker's attack and the chosen creature becomes the target instead. If there are no other creatures within range, the hag imposes disadvantage on the attacker's attack roll instead.

resist.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hag's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). She can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hag is a 17th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The hag can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The hag has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Dark One's Own Luck (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the hag makes an ability check or saving throw, it can add a {@dice d10} to the roll. It can do this after the roll is made but before any of the roll's effects occur.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or fall {@condition unconscious}. The creature remains {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute, or until it takes damage, or someone uses an action to shake or slap the creature awake.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The hag magically polymorphs into a Small or Medium female humanoid, or back into her true form. Her statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. She reverts to her true form if she dies.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The hag magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. To do so, the hag must have a {@item heartstone|mm} in her possession.

action.name: Nightmare Haunting (1/Day)
entries: While on the Ethereal Plane, the hag magically touches a sleeping humanoid on the Material Plane. A {@spell protection from evil and good} spell cast on the target prevents this contact, as does a {@spell magic circle}. As long as the contact persists, the target has dreadful visions. If these visions last for at least 1 hour, the target gains no beneft from its rest, and its hit point maximum is reduced by 5 ({@dice 1d10}). If this effect reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and if the target was evil, its soul is trapped in the hag's soul bag. The reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until removed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or similar magic.

action.name: Stupefying Cackle {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature within 30 feet of the hag and able to hear the hag must succeed on a {@dc 18} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 23 ({@dice 4d8 + 5}) psychic damage, and falls {@condition unconscious}. The creature remains {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute, or until it takes damage, or someone uses an action to shake or slap the creature awake. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition unconscious}. Constructs and undead are immune to this effect.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hag's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}). She can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hag is an 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The hag can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The hag can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 14} Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or have its Strength score reduced by {@dice 1d4}. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to
В противном случае снижение длится до тех пор, пока цель не закончит короткий или длинный отдых.

action.name: Illusory Appearance
entries: The hag covers herself and anything she is wearing or carrying with a magical illusion that makes her look like another creature of her general size and humanoid shape. The illusion ends if the hag takes a bonus action to end it or if she dies.

The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, the hag could appear to have smooth skin, but someone touching her would feel her rough flesh. Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a {@dc 20} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check to discern that the hag is disguised.

action.name: Change Shape (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The hag magically polymorphs into any beast of CR 4 or less, remaining in that form for up to 1 hour. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Maddening Cackle {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature within 30 feet of the hag and able to hear the hag must succeed on a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 14 ({@dice 3d8 + 1}) psychic damage, and must use its reaction to move up to half its speed and make a melee weapon attack against one creature of the hag's choice that the hag can see. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects. Constructs and undead are immune to this effect.

monster.name: Grimlock Shaman
senses: blindsight 30 ft. or 10 ft. while deafened (blind beyond this radius)

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The grimlock is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Blind Senses
entries: The grimlock can't use its {@sense blindsight} while {@condition deafened} and unable to smell.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The grimlock has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage

The {@condition poisoned} target is {@condition paralyzed}, and it can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

The target is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). If the target is Large or smaller, it is also {@condition restrained} until this grapple ends. While grappling the target, the grell has advantage on attack rolls against it and can't use this attack against other targets. When the grell moves, any
Large or smaller target it is grappling moves with it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gorgon makes two melee attacks: one with its gore and one with its hooves. It can replace its hooves attack with Trample if it is available.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) percing damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Trample {@recharge 5}
entries: The gorgon moves up to its speed in a straight line. During this move, it can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. A creature whose space the gorgon enters must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is pushed 5 feet to the nearest space out of the gorgon's path. On a failed save, the creature falls {@condition prone} and takes 23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage. If the gorgon remains in the {@condition prone} creature's space, the creature is also {@condition restrained} until it's no longer in the same space as the gorgon. While {@condition restrained} in this way, the creature, or another creature within 5 feet of it, can make a {@dc 23} Strength check. On a success, the creature is shunted to an unoccupied space of its choice within 5 feet of the gorgon and is no longer {@condition restrained}

action.name: Petrifying Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The gorgon exhales petrifying gas in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is petrifed until freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

If the golem remains in the {@condition prone} creature's space, the creature is also {@condition restrained} until it's no longer in the same space as the golem.

On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effect s last for 1 minute.
A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Berserk
entries: Whenever the golem starts its turn with 50 hit points or fewer, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. lf no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points.

The golem's creator, if within 60 feet of the berserk golem, can try to calm it by speaking frmly and persuasively. The golem must be able to hear its creator, who must take an action to make a {@dc 15} Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check. If the check succeeds, the golem ceases being berserk. If it takes damage while still at 50 hit points or fewer, the golem might go berserk again.

If the creature is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes the same damage and is knocked {@condition prone}.

An affected creature or another creature within 5 feet of it can take an action to extinguish the fire. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and doesn't catch fire.

action.name: Tangleweb
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 20 ft., one creature. {@h}The creature must succeed on a {@dc 11} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by sticky web-like adhesive. As an action, the {@condition restrained} creature can make a {@dc 11} Strength check, escaping from the tangleweb on a success. The effect ends if the tangleweb is destroyed. The tangleweb has AC 10, 5 hit points, resistance to bludgeoning damage, and immunity to poison and psychic damage.

action.name: Double Lob {@recharge 5}
entries: The goblin can make two ranged weapon attacks.

headerEntries: The gnoll is an 8th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

trait.name: Yeenoghu's Howl (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the gnoll emits a frenzy-inducing howl. Each gnoll ally that is within 30 feet of it, can hear it, and not already affected by Yeenoghu's Howl gain advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points until the start of the gnoll's next turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) колющего урона.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Change Shape (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The gnoll magically polymorphs into a giant hyena, remaining in that form for up to 1 hour. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The gnoll has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the gnoll's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Packmaster
entries: A allied gnoll that starts its turn within 30 feet of this gnoll and that can see and hear this gnoll gains Pack Tactics until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the gnoll moves at least 15 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a greataxe attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the gnoll can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gnoll makes three attacks, either with its greataxe or its longbow. She can replace one of those attacks with Battlefeld

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} попадание, досягаемость 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) повреждений от удара.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} попадание, дальность 150/600 футов, одно существо. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) колющего урона.

action.name: Battlefeld Cunning {@recharge 4}
entries: Up to two allies within 60 feet of the gnoll that can hear it can use their reactions to make one melee attack each.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

trait.name: Go for the Throat
entries: As a bonus action, the gnoll targets one hyena within 30 feet that can see and hear the gnoll. The hyena can use its reaction to move up to half its speed and make one melee attack against a {@condition prone} creature. If the hyena hits, the hit is automatically a critical hit.

trait.name: Slay Foe (1/Turn)
entries: The gnoll deals an extra 9 ({@dice 2d8}) damage with its weapon attack if it hits a creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Summon Hyenas (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the gnoll summons {@dice 1d4 + 1} hyenas. The hyenas appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the gnoll and acts as its allies. The hyenas act right after the gnoll on the same initiative count and fght until they're destroyed. They disappear when the gnoll dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gnoll makes two attacks, either with its glaive or its longbow. It can replace one of its attacks with hunting bolas.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) колющего урона.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} попадание, дальность 150/600 футов, одно существо. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) колющего урона.

action.name: Hunting Bolas
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} попадание, дальность 20/60 футов, одно существо. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d3 + 3}) колющего урона, и цель должна успешно выполнить {@dc 13} бросок на сохранение силы или быть {@condition restrained} и сбита с ног {@condition prone}. В качестве действия {@condition restrained} существо может сделать {@dc 13} проверку силы и сбежать в случае успеха. Эффект заканчивается, если охотничий болас уничтожен. Охотничий болас имеет AC 10, 5 хит-поинтов, устойчивость к колющему урону и иммунитет к яду и психическому урону.

trait.name: Aberrant Ground
entries: The ground in a 15-foot radius around the horror is doughlike difficult terrain. Each creature that starts its turn in that area must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or have its speed reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Gibbering
entries: The horror babbles incoherently while it can see any creature and isn't {@condition incapacitated}. Each creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the horror and can hear the gibbering must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn and rolls a {@dice d8} to determine what it does its turn. On a 1 to 4, the creature does nothing. On a 5 or 6, the creature takes no action or bonus action and uses all its movement to move in a randomly determined direction. On a 7 or 8, the creature makes a melee attack against a randomly determined creature within its reach or does nothing if it can't make such an attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gibbering horror uses Engulf. It then makes two Pseudopod Bite attacks, and if it can, uses its Blinding Spittle.

action.name: Pseudopod Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d8 + 2}) piercing damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the horror can't use the same pseudopod bite on another target. If the horror starts its turn grappling with a creature, it can use a bonus action to pull that creature within 5 feet of it.

action.name: Blinding Spittle
entries: The horror spits a chemical glob at a point it can see within 20 feet of it. The glob explodes in a blinding flash of light on impact. Each creature within 5 feet of the flash must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the horror's next turn.

action.name: Engulf
entries: The horror moves up to its speed. While doing so, it can enter Medium or smaller creatures' spaces. Whenever the horror enters a creature's space, the creature must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw. On a successful save, the creature can choose to be pushed 5 feet back or to the side of the horror. A creature that chooses not to be pushed suffers the consequences of a failed saving throw. On a failed save, the horror enters the creature's space, and the creature takes 29 ({@damage 6d8 + 2}) piercing damage and is engulfed. While engulfed, the creature is {@condition blinded}, can't breathe, and {@condition restrained}, and takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage and 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage at the start of each of the horror's turns. lf the target is killed by this damage, it is absorbed into the horror. When the horror moves, the engulfed creature moves with it. An engulfed creature can try to escape by taking an action to make a {@dc 13} Strength check. On a success, the creature escapes and enters a space of its choice within 5 feet of the horror. The horror can have only up to two Medium or small creatures engulfed at a time.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The giant can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Heart of the Storm
entries: Whenever the giant casts a spell other than a cantrip that deals lightning or thunder damage, a stormy aura surrounds it. In addition to the spell's effects, creatures of its choice within 10 feet of it take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) lightning or thunder damage (giant' choice).

trait.name: Sorcery Points
entries: The giant has 13 sorcery points. It can spend 1 or more sorcery points as a bonus action to gain one of the following benefits:

Heightened Spell: When the giant casts a spell that forces a creature to make a saving throw to resist the spell's effects, it can spend 3 sorcery points to give one target of the spell disadvantage on its first saving throw against the spell.
Quickened Spell: When the giant casts a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, it can spend 2 sorcery points to change the casting time to 1 bonus action for this casting.
Subtle Spell: When the giant casts a spell, it can spend 1 sorcery point to cast the spell without any somatic or verbal components.

trait.name: Thunderous Smite (1/Turn)
entries: As a bonus action, when the giant hits a creature with a weapon attack, it can expend a 1st level spell slot to deal {@damage 1d8} thunder damage to the target and the target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn. If the giant expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra thunder damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each level above 1st (maximum {@dice 5d8}).(maximum {@dice 5d8}).

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The giant's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The giant is a 17th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following paladin spells prepared:

trait.name: Aura of Judgement
entries: A creature hostile to the giant that is within 10 feet of the giant has disadvantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The giant has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Indomitable (3/day)
entries: The giant can reroll a saving throw it fails. It must use the new roll.

trait.name: Smite (1/Turn)
entries: As a bonus action, when the giant hits a creature with a weapon attack, it can expend a 1st level spell slot to deal {@damage 2d8} radiant or necrotic damage to the target and it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn. If the giant expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each level above 1st (maximum 5d8)

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant can use its frightful presence. It then makes two longsword attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) slashing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The giant moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: To Me
entries: Up to two allies within 60 feet of this giant that can hear it can each use their reaction to move up to their speed to the nearest possible space to the giant.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The giant makes a longsword attack.

legendary.name: Command (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The giant targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the giant, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lacedon attacks two times: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 5 ft., one creature. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the ghoul must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the ghoul's Stench for 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ghoul attacks three times: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 5 ft., one creature. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 5 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Turning Defance
entries: The agarat and any ghouls within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The agarat attacks two times: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 5 ft., one creature. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 5 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Horrid Scream {@recharge 5}
entries: The agarat can emit a bloodcurdling, supernatural scream. Each creature within 30 feet that can hear its scream takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage and must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature will have its hit point maximum reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The adept of Orcus is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Turning Defance
entries: The adept of Orcus and any ghouls within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The adept of Orcus attacks two times: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, range 5 ft., one creature. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monster.name: Ghost Warlock
languages: any languages it knew in life

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ghost's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). The ghost can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ghost is a 15th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:

trait.name: Ethereal Sight
entries: The ghost can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if she ends her turn inside an object.

trait.name: Whispering Aura
entries: At the start of each of the ghost's turns, each creature of its choice within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage, provided that the ghost isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Withering Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The ghost enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

action.name: Horrifying Visage
entries: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet of the ghost that can see it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. If the save fails by 5 or more, the target also ages {@dice 1d4 x 10} years. A {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the {@condition frightened} condition on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this ghost's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours. The aging effect can be reversed with a {@spell greater restoration} spell, but only within 24 hours of it occurring.

action.name: Possession
entries: One humanoid that the ghost can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the ghost; the ghost then disappears, and the target is {@condition incapacitated} and loses control of its body. The ghost now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The ghost can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that turn undead, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or profciencies.

The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the ghost ends it as a bonus action, or the ghost is turned or forced out by an effect like the dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, the ghost reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body.
The target is immune to this ghost's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.

monster.name: Ghost Necromancer
languages: any languages it knew in life

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting

The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the ghost ends it as a bonus action, or the ghost is turned or forced out by an effect like the dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, the ghost reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The ghost adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The marid's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 19}). The marid can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Captivating Presence
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the marid must make a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes {@condition charmed} by the marid for 1 minute or until the creature is farther than 30 feet away from it. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to the marid's Captivating Presence for 24 hours.

trait.name: Grant Wish (3/year)
entries: The marid can grant a wish spell to a creature that isn't a genie. In order to work, the marid must be willing to grant the wish. Unless carefully and properly worded, the marid will pervert the wish's intent into a literal but undesirable or partial fulfillment. The marid can't grant a wish purposely to serve its own needs.

trait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the marid dies, its body disintegrates into crystalline powder, leaving behind only equipment the marid was wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The marid has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The marid makes two trident attacks.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d6 + 8}) piercing damage, or 21 ({@dice 3d8 + 8}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Water Jet
entries: The marid magically shoots water in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) bludgeoning damage and, if it is Huge or smaller, is pushed up to 30 feet away from the marid and knocked {@condition prone}. On a success, a target takes half the bludgeoning damage, but is neither pushed nor knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Trident
entries: The marid makes a trident attack.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The marid casts a spell from its list of innate spells, using a spell slot as normal.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The marid magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Surging Waves (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The marid magically unleashes a violent wave of water that gushes forth from it in all directions. Each creature within 15 feet of the marid must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is Huge or smaller, is pushed 15 feet and knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save, or half as much damage and isn't pushed and knocked {@condition prone} on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The marid's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). The marid can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the marid dies, its body disintegrates into crystalline powder, leaving behind only equipment the marid was wearing or carrying.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The marid makes two trident attacks.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) piercing damage, or 16 ({@dice 2d8 +7}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Water Jet
entries: The marid magically shoots water in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) bludgeoning damage and, if it is Huge or smaller, is pushed up to 20 feet away from the marid and knocked {@condition prone}. On a success, a target takes half the bludgeoning damage, but is neither pushed nor knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Water Spouts {@recharge 5}
entries: The marid targets up to four creatures it can see within 30 feet of it and magically creates powerful water spouts beneath them. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) bludgeoning damage, and if it is Large or smaller, is flung upward up to 30 feet. If a thrown target strikes an object, such as a wall or floor, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. At the end of the turn, the water spouts end and the affected creatures fall back down (taking falling damage) and are knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and is not flung upward.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The efreeti's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). The efreeti can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the efreeti dies, its body disintegrates into crystalline powder, leaving behind only equipment the efreeti was wearing or carrying.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The efreeti makes two scimitar attacks or uses its Hurl Flame twice.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage and if the target is not immune to fire, it gains vulnerability to fire damage until the end of the efreeti's next turn.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 12} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 5d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Arcing Fireblade {@recharge 5}
entries: The efreeti swings its scimitar in a full arc, and every creature within 10 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed saving throw, a creature takes 14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage and if the target is not immune to fire, it gains vulnerability to fire damage until the end of the efreeti's next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and doesn't gain vulnerability to fire damage.

reaction.name: Fiery Shield
entries: The efreeti adds 5 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the efreeti must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon. If the attack misses as a result of this, the attacker takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to the efreeti's Captivating Presence for 24 hours.

entries: The efreeti can grant a wish spell to a creature that isn't a genie. In order to work, the efreeti must be willing to grant the wish. The efreeti can't grant a wish purposely to serve its own needs.

entries: If the efreeti dies, its body disintegrates into crystalline powder, leaving behind only equipment the efreeti was wearing or carrying.
